screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .videomeld file in GoldWave VideoMeld 1.7
screenshot.caption: VIDEOMELD file open in GoldWave VideoMeld 1.7

description: VideoMeld provides various features for editing video, audio, images, and effects into presentations, tutorials, home videos, and training videos. It comes with transitions, overlays, text captions, and compositing capabilities.

For example, you can import videos and images from your vacation into a VIDEOMELD project, and then apply audio and effects to it to create a video presentation. After finishing the project, you can export it to a video file type or publish it to YouTube or Vimeo.
